about_the_game:
Fluvstruck is an adult dating sim experience, combining time management skills and memory challenges to create a fun interactive visual novel. Each mini-game date gives you the chance to please the girl you’re trying to impress.



You’re a writer who has the absolute inability to write romantic novels - until you have a fateful encounter with Yuna, your book editor and succubus. Yuna gives you a magical app that allows you to experience love first hand and eventually write the book of your dreams… at a price.

content_descriptors.notes: Fluvstruck contains content not appropriate for all ages such as nudity, sexual content and general mature themes. It may not be appropriate for viewing at work. Player discretion is advised.

You’re a writer who has the absolute inability to write romantic novels - until you have a fateful encounter with Yuna, your book editor and succubus. Yuna gives you a magical app that allows you to experience love first hand and eventually write the book of your dreams… at a price.
name: Fluvstruck

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7300HQCPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: You are a romantic novelist. Sadly - you're absolutely terrible at writing stories, until you meet Yuna, a hopeless young girl who is obsessed with teasing you and putting you to work. Overcome your creative writing block by changing your observations of love into experience.
